posts.postText: When playing Gmod (TTT) my game  freezes/locks up. Any sound that was playing is now on a constant loop. Sometimes the game would close and would say the program has stopped responding. Other times would require a hard restart. Any idea what is causing this? Why would this older game do this but my BFBC2 run completely fine?
Can't say why, blame Garry, my comp can run Farcry 2 on max settings at 90-120fps, but I have terrible problems with gmod too.
